title: Jan Tschichold
content:
Does anyone know the correct pronunciation of J.T.'s name?   
   
Thanks
author: anonymous

comments.content: At Reading (Uni of) it was pronounced: 'cheekolt' by the powers that be. ((my two cents))

And to think that type designers have a geeky reputation...   
   
hhp
J.T.'s name is pronounced, MC Jizan Chiknizold.
that shit's down with da niggidy-niggidy-neue typographie
